detail_desc: Waist-high briefs in jersey designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Cotton chinos with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets with a button, and slim legs.

detail_desc: Triangle bikini top with frilled trims and moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Ties at the back and back of the neck with round, flat pendants.

Skirt in washed, superstretch twill with buttons down the front and fake front pockets. Unlined.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with wide foldover ribbing around the neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend in various designs with elasticated tops.
Calf-length lace dress with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam and concealed zip at the waist, and a flared skirt. Lined.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Bikini top with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups, a bow at the front, ties at the back of the neck and metal fastener at the back.
Fitted vest top in stretch, ribbed cotton jersey.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Short skirt in a textured weave with a high waist, detachable belt and a concealed zip and button at one side. Unlined.

Bikini top with underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that are joined together by a braided strap with decorative metal rings. Metal fastening at the back.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with imitation suede inside and two handles at the top. Unlined. Size 16x28x38 cm.

Maxi dress in an airy weave in a narrow cut at the top with gathers around the neckline. Opening at the back with a tie at the back of the neck, elasticated seam at the waist and a slit at the back. Lined.

Suit trousers in linen with a regular waist, zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and tapered legs with creases.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Round glasses with transparent plastic frames and lenses.
Nursing bras in soft stretch fabric with opening, lined cups, wide elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Seamless.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with side pockets and wide elastication with a drawstring at the waist. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
H&M LOVES COACHELLA. Imitation leather belt with a large, embossed metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
Nylon gym bag with a contrasting colour drawstring at the top. Can be carried like a backpack. Size 40x44 cm.
Rings in various designs. Two smooth and eight with various decorations.
Jersey trousers with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and slim legs with seams and a concealed zip at the hems.

Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped chest pocket, pockets in the side seams, an inner pocket with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline in a contrasting colour and a gently rounded hem.

Silk tie in a grosgrain weave. Width 6 cm.
A-line blouse in an airy, patterned cotton weave with elastication around the top and short, flounced, raglan sleeves.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cigarette trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with a fake fly, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and gently tapered legs with creases. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit.
Cap in woven fabric with text embroidery at the front, a contrasting colour peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Espadrilles in a cotton weave with a braided jute trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted soles.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Cape in faux fur made from a soft wool blend with concealed press-studs at the front, deep armholes at the sides, a pleat at the back and pleats at the hem. Lined. Made partly from recycled polyester.
Biker jacket in imitation suede with a detachable faux fur collar, diagonal zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Short sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.

Fleece-lined set with a hat and pair of mittens in a soft cable knit. Hat with a faux fur pompom on top, small imitation suede appliqué on the front, earflaps and ties under the chin. Mittens with ribbed cuffs. Sizes 0-2M and 2-6M without thumbs.

Sleeveless blouse in a soft weave with a small stand-up collar, concealed buttons down the front and open chest pockets. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Cotton cap with a sweatband inside in a cotton weave, and elastication at the back.
Running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with reflective details. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.

Set with two pairs of earrings and three rings in metal. One pair of earrings and one ring are decorated with plastic beads.

Swim trousers and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small collar. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
Pyjamas with a top and pair of shorts in soft jersey. Straight-cut top with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and short slits in the sides of the hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Dress in soft, fine-knit cotton with a pointelle section at the front, long sleeves, buttons at the back and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Seam at the waist with a decorative bow and a flared skirt.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Pyjama shorts in soft patterned jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist,a fake fly and side pockets.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
